name: Bubble Sumo
description:
How to Play:

- The objective of the game is to get a high score!
- You are given a point when you kill an enemy, to kill an enemy you must dash into them.
- However, when you dash into an enemy, you will lose health and will only gain it back over time. To indicate that you will die, if you were to hit an enemy, your health will flash. 

I hope you enjoy and any feedback at all would be appreciated!

Controls:

A and D - move left and right respectively 
W - Jump (you can also jump a second time while in the air)
LeftShift - Dash/Attack
